Command line tools

Collaboration diagram for Command line tools:

Detailed Description

Command line tools.

Description:

Tools for

  • specific analyses and characterizations
  • converting data to and from a format FCLib can use.
  • viewing how FCLib is interpreting files.


Modules

 analyzeSpotWelds
 Presto spotweld analysis (more at analyzeSpotWelds.c).
 bb2exo
 Convert bounding box file to a dataset (more at bb2exo.c).
 dyna2names.pl
 Create a .names file from an LSDyna input file.
 edgeStats
 Get edge statistics for dataset (more at edgeStats.c).
 exodump
 Print meta data from an Exodus file (more at exodump.c).
 extents
 Print bounding boxes of the dataset and its meshes (more at extents.c).
 fc2ensight
 Convert a dataset to Ensight format (ascii) (more at fc2ensight.c).
 fc2exo
 Convert a dataset to Exodus format.
 fcconvert
 Convert a dataset to another file type (more at fcconvert.c).
 fcdump
 Print FCLib's interpretation of a dataset (more at fcdump.c).
 fcinfo
 Provide information about installed version of FCLib.
 fcswapAssoc
 Converts association of one var type to another (more at fcswapAssociation.c).
 gaplines
 Look at gaps by creating lines connecting the surfaces of two meshes (more at gaplines.c).
 geomExtract
 Extract the requested geometry to a new dataset (more at geomExtract.c).
 loadHistory
 Calculate the load history on a subset of a mesh (more at loadHistory.c).
 maxStress
 Report regions of maximum stress, either in compression or tension. (more at maxStress.c).
 regionreassembler
 Reassembles vars on promoted subset meshes (from the subsetter tool) onto the orig mesh. (more at regionreassembler.c).
 screwBreaks
 Analysis of screw Breaks (more at screwBreaks.c).
 seriesAnalyzer
 Variety of series analyses (more at seriesAnalyzer.c).
 sierradump
 Print FCLib's interpretation of a Sierra input file (more at sierradump.c).
 subsetter
 Subsets on a var, optional promotion to mesh to work with reassmbler toolput file (more at subsetter.c).
 tearCompare
 Compare tears from two different datasets (more at tearCompare.c).
 tears
 Report tear characterizations on a given dataset (more at tears.c).
 threshBoundBox
 Get bounding boxes of thresholded regions (more at threshBoundBox.c).
 varNormalize
 Normalize a variable and rewrite dataset (more at varNormalize.c).
 varSmooth
 Smooth a variable and rewrite dataset (more at varSmooth.c).
 varStats
 Get variable statistics for dataset (more at varStats.c).
 volumeSegments
 Get volumes of thresholded regions (more at volumeSegments.c).
 windowVars
 Window averagest he seq vars on a dataset (more at windowVars.c).
